attributes.additional_details:
In June 2011 Criteria changed for IVF Not everyone can receive free NHS Funded IVF Each PCT Make their own rules and Don’t seem to follow NICE Guidelines,, Anyone who has a child from a previous relationship is not allowed to have free NHS Funded IVF, Yet the Government/Prisons are offering Free IVF to convicts because of their Human rights.
This is all wrong; we have rights to have children What about our Human Rights? Infertility isn't a choice; we can't help having fertility problems. It's as if we are being punished for something that's out of our hands as long as you’re in a committed relationship.
I would like all couples to have at least 1 Round of IVF on the NHS, Regardless of age etc
Make IVF treatments Free for childless couples,  raise proper awareness once and for all,
I would like the government to stop the prisons offering this a life cannot be swapped for a life and for them rule that all PCT's must give 1 try of IVF
Lets stop this lottery once and for all

rejection.details:
Please see: Change the age and the laws around IVF on the NHS.

and

Stop Prisoners Getting IVF on the NHS
